verbose_text: We also investigated the role of ADAM10 and ADAM17 in PMA induced sCD200 shedding of Hek293 cells using stealth siRNA silencers and showed that both ADAM silencers inhibited PMA induced but not constitutive sCD200 shedding, consistent with the results showed in the TAPI-0 inhibition experiment mentioned above.
evidence: ADAM17 in PMA-induced sCD200 shedding of Hek293 cells using stealth siRNA silencers and showed that both ADAM silencers inhibited PMA-induced but not constitutive sCD200 shedding, consistent with the results showed in the TAPI-0
